MCGS.QA.summary: Medicare Group Q.P.S.C. provides health care services in Qatar. The company operates a hospital and medical clinic center; and promotes medical services. It also provides home nursing and physical therapy services, as well as specializes in nutrition services. The company was formerly known as Al Ahli Specialised Hospital Company Q.P.S.C. Medicare Group Q.P.S.C. was founded in 1996 and is based in Doha, Qatar.

QGMD.QA.long_name: Qatari German Company for Medical Devices Q.P.S.C.
QGMD.QA.summary: Qatari German Company for Medical Devices Q.P.S.C. manufactures and sells single use disposable syringes in the Middle East. The company offers Q JectUltra, an insulin syringe serving as a tool in diabetic care; Q Flow for infusion therapy; Q Need, a single use hypodermic needle; Q Ject, a single use syringe for the curative medications; and Q Safe, a re-use prevention syringe. It also trades in medical consumables, medical equipment, and medical furniture. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Doha, Qatar.
